name: ErgoMax Chair
description: The ErgoMax Chair is an ergonomic chair designed to provide optimal comfort and support during long hours of sitting. It features adjustable seat height, lumbar support, and armrests, allowing you to customize the chair to your needs. With its breathable mesh backrest and cushioned seat, the ErgoMax Chair promotes good posture and reduces the risk of back pain.

name: TechSavvy Chair
description: The TechSavvy Chair is a versatile task chair designed for tech-savvy individuals. It features a sleek and modern design with adjustable seat height and a 360-degree swivel function. The TechSavvy Chair also includes built-in USB ports and wireless charging capabilities, allowing you to conveniently charge your devices while working. With its comfortable padding and ergonomic design, this chair is perfect for long hours of focused work.

name: ProForm Chair
